description.name: cam_1532402928112460
description.description:
**Brief Description:**

The image depicts a clear day scene in an urban environment. The road is divided into multiple lanes with the ego lane being the rightmost lane. There is a large truck parked on the left side of the road.

**Detailed Description:**

The scene is set during daylight under clear weather conditions. The road is a three-lane urban street with traffic moving smoothly. The ego lane is unobstructed while the leftmost lane is occupied by a parked delivery truck. 

Several vehicles are visible on the road, including a silver car moving through the middle lane. There are orange and white construction barriers to the right, indicating some roadwork or lane modifications. 

A person is observed near the parked truck, likely unloading goods. The surroundings include trees lining the street and modern buildings, adding to the urban atmosphere. Traffic lights are visible in the distance, all green, allowing the vehicles to proceed without stopping. The scene suggests a typical day in a city, with business operations and regular traffic flow.

The image depicts a daytime urban environment with clear weather. The road has construction cones guiding traffic, and the vehicle is positioned partially off the main lane on the left side.

**Detailed Description:**

The scene shows a straight urban road with a slight incline, flanked by trees and modern buildings. A white minivan is partially parked on the left curb, encroaching onto the main road. Several construction cones are placed along the road, indicating a temporary lane division, possibly for ongoing maintenance or construction activities. The road is lined with barriers on the left, suggesting restricted areas. The visibility is good, with natural light illuminating the scene, and there are no pedestrians or other vehicles immediately in the visible path. This suggests a relatively low traffic volume at this time.
